        public static java.lang.Boolean use1(java.lang.Integer i1,
                                     Player player,
                                     Position p1,
                                     java.lang.Integer i2,
                                     java.lang.Integer i3)
        Parameters:
        i1 - is the index of the card in the game
        player - is the player to whom this effect apply
        p1 - is where you want your dice to be placed
        i2 - is the position of the dice in the pool
        i3 - specifies if you want increment or decrement the shade of your dice
        Returns:
        the result of this operation

        public static java.lang.Boolean use8(java.lang.Integer i1,

        player - is the player to whom this effect apply
        p1 - is where you want your dice to be placed
        i2 - is the position of the dice in the pool
        Returns:
        the result of this operation (place this dice even if you have already placed a dice, skip your next turn though)

      • use11

        public static java.lang.Boolean use11(java.lang.Integer i1,
                                      Player player,
                                      Position p1,
                                      java.lang.Integer i2,
                                      java.lang.Integer i3)
        Parameters:
        i1 - is the index of the card in the game
        player - is the player to whom this effect apply
        p1 - is where you want your dice to be placed
        i2 - is the position of the dice in the pool
        i3 - is the number to assign to a randomly extracted dice from the pool, exchanged with the drafted dice
        Returns:
        the result of this operation

      • use12

        public static java.lang.Boolean use12(java.lang.Integer i1,
                                      Player player,
                                      Position p1,
                                      Position p2,
                                      Position p3,
                                      Position p4,
                                      PositionR pr)
        Parameters:
        i1 - is the index of the card in the game
        player - is the player to whom this effect apply
        p1 - is where you want your dice1 to be taken
        p2 - is where you want your dice1 to be placed
        pr - is the position of the dice in the roundtrack (selected dice must match the color of this dice)
        p3 - is where you want your dice2 to be taken
        p4 - is where you want your dice2 to be placed
        Returns:
        the result of this operation
